name: Legend Maker Express
description:
Your job as a cartographer is to create a map of the city based off details given by local townspeople. You will need to pay close attention as some of the details may come in the form of simple conversation. To create the map, you will drag and drop locations onto the gridded plain, based off hints given by the characters. Things to note:
  • Distance is measured in units referred to as blocks. 1 block = 1 square
  • Distance will never be measured diagonally.
  • The distance between two buildings is the number of squares between them, plus the one square in which the destination is located.
